Vamprah::

"I guess " continued Vamprah "that Predacon army tried reprogramed 
me... to caught me they used a stun-weapon and I almost was conceus 
when they carried me a sort of lab, and in that point my memories are 
confuse... After several days I could understand rightly where was: 
in a Predacon Army's Base.. they said me that I just had to 
elections: Work for Army or execution. They tried to reprogrammed me 
but my internal program didn't let them... "


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:

>

her

ran

Cybertron 
> surface existed severals tunnel and caves... most of them exist 
since

> caught me"
